name: Werewolf Life
description: Werewolf Life is a hardcore 2D platformer with elements of survival in which you have to pass the levels playing for a werewolf. In this game your main task is collecting items and overcoming various obstacles. At each level there are four hearts which you need to collect. After you collect all hearts and overcome all the traps, the way to the next level opens. But don'tt think that it would be so easy, because you have only one life and when they come in contact with at least 1 trap you perish, accordingly, the level will restart.
